MajorClaims.Text: it is not the good idea for teenagers to have job while they are still students
it can interfere with their life in various ways
for a teenager it is important to pay attention on their studies

Claims.Text: many argue that it provide good working experience
Having jobs would affect the health of the student
It divert their mind from studies and would take away their childhood phase from their life
Having job would affect their health, divert them from studies and take away one of the important phase from their life
would affect their mental and physical health
If the student get involved himself in job in rest of the time, then it would cause an extra burden on them
jobs can divert students from their studies
they should take advantage of life as much possible they can

Premises.Text: jobs has various responsibilities like attendance, sometimes extra work and so on
This would result in stress, tension and tiredness
They won't be able to get proper time for relaxation, sleep
He has to spend his most of time in school to get a good grades
A student has to do lots of studies in today's competitive world to prove himself
If students started earning in earlier age in their life, then they get attracted towards money
They feel themselves independent and would prefer to work more for money
This would affect their studies, they loose their interest from studies
they drop out their studies so as to earn more money
the main drawback of teenagers job is that, they miss out the fun of their childhood time
They have whole life to do job and prove themselves, but the childhood phase will never return in their life
He would miss various childhood activities such as hang out with friends, clubs and fun activities and social interaction with others
